channel.title: [508] Help with commands please [508]

item.title: [508] Help with commands please [508]
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

How would i make this so only two people could do these commands
Becuase i want it so me (elvemage) and the co owner (dildo) can do these commandsâ€¦

i also would like to know how to change it so when it sends the message it would say

you have been promoted to administrator by <img=1> (username here)

Thankyou && i hope you can help

else if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equals("elvemage")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } else if (cmd[0].equals("givemod") && p.username.equals("Elvemage")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Moderator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } else if (cmd[0].equals("demote") && p.username.equals("elvemage")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 0; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been Demoted by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } else if (cmd[0].equals("alltome") && p.username.equals("elvemage")) { for(Player pz : Engine.players) { if (pz != null) { pz.setCoords(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel); }

Read full topic
